message: the first version of a writer based on column groups now works!

added: /// Type of compression to use, defaults to <see cref="CompressionMethod.Snappy"/>
public CompressionMethod CompressionMethod { get; set; } = CompressionMethod.Snappy;
return new ParquetRowGroupWriter(_schema, Stream, ThriftStream, _footer, CompressionMethod, _formatOptions, rowCount);
deleted: return new ParquetRowGroupWriter(_schema, Stream, ThriftStream, _footer, CompressionMethod.Snappy, rowCount);
